sentences.sContent: We plan to edit an English book for use in foreign language colleges.
sentences.sContent_eng: We plan to edit an English book for use in foreign language colleges.
sentences.sCn: 我们计划编辑一本英语书给外语大学使用。

sentences.sContent: She has an English class this morning,so she brings her English book.
sentences.sContent_eng: She has an English class this morning,so she brings her English book.
sentences.sCn: 她今天早上有英语课，所以带上了英语书。
